sentences.sentence: Whatever the prank, the trickster usually ends it by yelling to his victim, "April Fool!"
sentences.translation: 不管是什么恶作剧，实施恶作剧的那个人一般以向被整蛊的人喊出“愚人节快乐”来结束恶作剧。

sentences.sentence: A further twist was added when the trickster admitted to engineering the plot to raise attention to the mother's plight.
sentences.translation: 更加纠结的是，这名骗子承认，他炒作此事是为了引起公众对这位母亲深陷困境的注意。

sentences.sentence: Nov. 4. Maurizio Cattelan: All will present the complete works of this Italian trickster at the Guggenheim Museum in New York.
sentences.translation: 11月4日“莫里吉奥·卡特兰：所有”将会在纽约古根海姆博物馆开幕，届时会展出这位意大利骗子的全部作品。
